name: JJ Hiew
title: Co-founder
description: Formerly the CTO of Merscient Inc. Over 10+ years of experience in product development and strategy. JJ has also done mobile dev, db admin, business intelligence, sysadmin, and devops. He's a graduate of the University of Toronto, with a B.Sc in Computer Science.

name: Ben Zelikovitz
title: Co-founder, Advisor
description: Currently serves as Director at Sitescout. Ben has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and recruitment. Ben is one of our advisors.

name: Zurvan Robinson
title: Developer
description: Zurvan has over 15+ years of experience as a web developer. He's worked at numerous successful startups and large non-profits like the UHN in Toronto.

name: Disco Stu
title: Chief Scientist
description: Disco is the most diligent scientist we know, always testing the laws of gravity.
